sourcesContent:
<template>
  <el-dialog :visible="visible" title="订单表单" @close="handleClose" width="600px">
    <el-form :model="form" label-width="120px" size="medium">
      <el-form-item label="订单编号">
        <el-input v-model="form.orderNumber" placeholder="请输入订单编号" required />
      </el-form-item>
      <el-form-item label="总金额">
        <el-input type="number" v-model="form.totalAmount" placeholder="请输入总金额" required />
      </el-form-item>
      <el-form-item label="状态">
        <el-select v-model="form.orderStatus" placeholder="选择状态" required>
          <el-option label="待处理" value="pending" />
          <el-option label="已发货" value="shipped" />
          <el-option label="已完成" value="completed" />
          <el-option label="已退款" value="refunded" />
        </el-select>
      </el-form-item>
    </el-form>
    <template #footer>
      <el-button @click="handleClose">取消</el-button>
      <el-button type="primary" @click="submitForm">保存</el-button>
    </template>
  </el-dialog>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  props: {
    order: {
      type: Object,
      default: () => ({})
    },
    modelValue: {
      type: Boolean,
      default: false
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      visible: this.modelValue,
      form: {
        orderNumber: '',
        totalAmount: 0,
        orderStatus: 'pending'
      }
    };
  },
  watch: {
    order: {
      immediate: true,
      handler(newVal) {
        if (newVal) {
          this.form = {...newVal};
        }
      }
    },
    modelValue: {
      immediate: true,
      handler(newVal) {
        this.visible = newVal;
      }
    }
  },
  methods: {
    submitForm() {
      const method = this.order ? 'PUT' : 'POST';
      const url = this.order ? `http://localhost:8080/api/orders/${this.order.orderId}` : 'http://localhost:8080/api/orders';

      fetch(url, {
        method,
        headers: {
          'Content-Type': 'application/json'
        },
        body: JSON.stringify(this.form)
      }).then(() => {
        this.$emit('refresh');
        this.handleClose();
      });
    },
    handleClose() {
      this.visible = false;
      this.$emit('close');
    }
  }
};
</script>

<style scoped>
.el-dialog {
  width: 600px; /* 设置对话框宽度 */
}

.el-form-item {
  width: 100%; /* 让表单项占满父容器的宽度 */
}
</style>
